meanings.definition: A person who manages or works at a hotel.
meanings.sent1: The hotelmen greeted the guests with warm smiles.
meanings.sent2: The hotelmen ensure that the rooms are clean and comfortable for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The hotelmen had a race to see who could make the best bed in the shortest time.
meanings.sent4: The hotelmen are the conductors of the symphony that is a well-run hotel.
meanings.sent5: The hotelmen are the unsung heroes of the hospitality industry.
